# Leaflet 

```{r cache=TRUE}
dc_crime <- sf::st_read("https://opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/dc3289eab3d2400ea49c154863312434_8.geojson", quiet = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)
```

```{r out.width = '100%'}
leaflet() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron)%>% 
  addCircles(data = dc_crime, color = "#800000")
```
